name: chokingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel as if you are choking (= unable to breathe): The stench of beer and sweat mingled together to make the air chokingly hot. "You two go ahead," she said chokingly, her throat aching from the smoke.
More examplesFewer examplesDespite being chokingly sad, the play's final message is optimistic.When she talks of her son, the sense of loss is chokingly obvious.
